original_text: As the people were in expectation, and all were questioning in their hearts concerning John, whether he might be the Christ,
korean_text: 백성들이 바라고 기다리므로 모든 사람들이 요한을 혹 그리스도신가 심중에 생각하니

sentences.original_text: As the people were in expectation,
and all were questioning in their hearts
whether he might be the Christ,
